title: So people can sit safe while abusing people?
body:
I can't control my emotions but I can hold my tongue.

These people know full well the risks so obviously the threat of being denied a little pleasure out of punishing people, putting them down and hurting them by losing an account isn't enough because they do it anyway so there needs to be a 0 tolerance policy. Not a warning system. I shouldn't have to put in an effort to report these people and if I do it should be checked on and be an instant ban. If I am upset, I wont report someone because I'd rather continue on and do something else other than dwell on their scumbag name while I report them. It's a life skill. Learn it. Teach it.

there is an automated system.

> they cant just ban people with out the prof

Which is EXACTLY what the system does. It gets reports, checks the chat logs of the game in question and, if the person who was reported use abusive/offensive language, it punishes them. In fact, in the first few days, there were 3 people who came to complain on the boards about it, claiming they didn't abuse/did "minimal" abuse and got punished at which point Sephyre came round and talked about how they were abusive in the games, offering to go through the chat logs with them if they were willing to post them and, big surprise, not one of them took up that offer.
